text: Club Deportivo Huétor Vega is a Spanish football team located in Huétor Vega, Granada, in the autonomous community of Andalusia. Founded in 1927 it currently plays in Tercera División – Group 9, holding home matches at Municipal Las Viñas, with a capacity of 1,800 spectators. == History == CD Huétor Vega was founded in 1927. On June 28, 2018 the club signed an affiliation agreement with Granada CF. Following June it was prolonged for one more year. On April 17, 2020 it was informed that Huétor Vega would not renew the agreement, which ends on June 30, 2020. ==Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |-
